level.heading: RECONSIDERATION AND REINSTATEMENT OF LICENSES (ยง 17-2421)

level.text: A person whose application has been denied or whose commission has been revoked by the Board may, by filing a new application accompanied by the proper fee, request the Board to reconsider the matter.
Upon showing of cause satisfactory to it, the Board may direct the Secretary of the District of Columbia to issue a commission in the usual manner.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: ยง 25.4 of Regulation No. 73-13, approved May 24, 1973, 19 DCR 1147, 1153 (June 11, 1973), 25 DCRR ยง 25.4.
